channel.title: Posts - Terry Chen
channel.description: Hi, this is Terry. I'm documenting my product ideas and learning notes in this blog. I'm interested in creating new user experiences through generative ai, focusing on synthesized content generation and actionable insight extraction.
channel.copyright: Â© 2025 Terry Chen. All rights reserved.

image.title: Terry Chen
image.description: Hi, this is Terry. I'm documenting my product ideas and learning notes in this blog. I'm interested in creating new user experiences through generative ai, focusing on synthesized content generation and actionable insight extraction.

item.title: When do I Sunset a Product?
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: A framework for deciding when to sunset products and projects. Understanding opportunity costs, sunk cost fallacy, and making difficult decisions about failing ventures.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Using LLMs as a Cover up for Poor Thinking
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: How the ease of LLM-generated content masks poor reasoning and why developing domain expertise remains crucial for meaningful innovation beyond automated productivity gains.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Questions as the New Bottleneck in Learning
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: In an age of infinite information, asking the right questions has become more valuable than finding answers. Exploring how question formulation is transforming education and knowledge acquisition.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Product Engineers and AI Multipliers
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: How AI is transforming product engineering teams into smaller, more efficient units. Learn why product engineers are becoming more valuable than traditional product managers in AI-first organizations.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: The Craft of Miyazaki in an AI-Generated World
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Explore Hayao Miyazaki's meticulous animation process and its significance in today's AI-generated creative landscape. Learn about the value of craft in a world of automated content.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: 2024 in Review
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Reflecting on 2024: lessons from founding Cogno, the importance of hands-on product development, choosing college over dropping out, and key insights for first-time founders.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: How to Work on What You Love
item.author: Patrick Collison, Paul Graham, etc (Patrick Collison, Paul Graham, etc)
item.description: Curated advice from successful entrepreneurs and thinkers on finding passion, going deep on interests, and building a meaningful career doing what you love.
item.dc:creator: Patrick Collison, Paul Graham, etc
